{"id":551209362,"lang":"cpp","time":"6 months, 1 week","timestamp":1631062521,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/551209362/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Number","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isNumber(string s) {        \n        int i=0,n=s.size();\n        if(!isdigit(s[n-1]) && s[n-1]!='.') return false;\n        bool d=false,e=false;\n        for(i=0;i<n;i++){\n            if(isdigit(s[i])) continue;\n            if(s[i]=='+' || s[i]=='-'){       \n                if(i==0) continue;\n                if(i-1>=0 && (s[i-1]=='E' || s[i-1]=='e')) continue;\n                return false;\n            }\n            if(isalpha(s[i]) && s[i]!='E' && s[i]!='e') return false;\n            if(s[i]=='E' || s[i]=='e'){\n                if(e || i==0) return false;\n                if(i+1>=s.size() || (!isdigit(s[i+1]) && s[i+1]!='+' && s[i+1]!='-'))return false;\n                e=true;\n            }\n            else if(s[i]=='.'){\n                if(e || d || n==1 || (i+1<s.size() && isalpha(s[i+1]))) return false;\n                d=true;\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-number"}
